<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A definition of a single resource script token. Each token has its kind</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (declared in ResourceScriptTokenList) and holds a value - a reference</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// representation of the token.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// RCToken does not claim ownership on its value. A memory buffer containing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the token value should be stored in a safe place and cannot be freed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nor reallocated.</span></CodeLine>
